name: BREAK IN (itch)
description:
There is a virus spreading around the world. Your mission is to break into the secret lab owned by the evil blobs! They created the virus! Shoot the green bottle looking things to destroy them! Don't touch the spikes!

Controls

Arrow keys to move

You cursor to shoot

Credits:

@found4k - Programmer and some art

@comigo - Prefabs and ct.js game engine

Tips:

Shoot to break things

Use a medical box to get 1+ health

use box tubes to get to the next level

Twitter - @Found4k
